title: Add More Measurable Achievements
description: Include specific metrics and quantifiable results in your experience descriptions.

title: Use Strong Action Verbs
description: Start bullet points with powerful action verbs like "Developed", "Implemented", "Led".

title: Improve Formatting Consistency
description: Ensure consistent spacing, bullet points, and font usage throughout.

title: Add Relevant Skills Section
description: Include a dedicated skills section highlighting technical and soft skills.
